about_the_game:
The fate of the entire world rests on your shoulders. The enemy is relying on that strategic bridge to transport their deadly equipment, but you have the power to disrupt their supply line. Take control of a powerful drone and arm yourself with grenades. The environment is your playground, and with a vast array of weapons and abilities at your disposal, you can experiment with different tactics and unleash your full potential. The future of the war is in your hands.

As a skilled drone pilot, you have the power to lead a fleet of five drones into the ultimate battle. Choose from a range of crafts and arm them with deadly weapons such as small bombs, grenades, and even jars filled with pickles. Call in an artillery strike or unleash the power of a nuke or laser beam from a satellite for added destruction. The bridge must fall!


Physics




Get ready to witness an epic display of destruction with many explosions and fully destructible structures that will take your gameplay experience to the next level.

Variety of content


// GIF HERE

Unleash the full potential of your arsenal! With a wide range of drones, projectiles, special abilities, and upgrades at your disposal, you have everything you need to take your battles to the next level. Prepare to dominate the field and emerge victorious! As development continues, we add additional content for you to play with.


Random events




The heat of battle can bring about unexpected events, like stumbling upon hostile reinforcements or getting some aviation support. What about a naval drone, packed with explosives, charging toward the enemy's positions?


Special Abilities


// GIF HERE

The power of each drone knows no bounds with a flare that can call upon the mightiest of support. From artillery strikes to rocket salvos, these special abilities are a force to be reckoned with. And with the ability to unleash a devastating nuke, there's no telling what kind of destruction they can unleash.

content_descriptors.notes: Bridge Hunter features violent content, including shooting and explosions. If this is not suitable for you, it may be best to avoid playing this game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 7th gen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 10th gen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Greetings, pilot. Get ready to deploy your drone for the mission at hand! Your objective is to prevent the enemy from using a vital bridge. You have the freedom to try out various tactics and abilities in a fully destructible environment. Your role is crucial!
